queries.description: Additional simple cases for things for the ADQL parser, the last three ones, which are incorrect, are being parsed.

query.description: Sequences for whitespace and comments are skipped
query.adql:
SELECT x
-- an inline comment
-- and another one
from Y

SELECT ivo_foo(6) || 9
-- an inline comment
-- and another one
from Y

query.description: Sequences for whitespace and comments are skipped
query.adql:
SELECT ivo_foo('11') || 11
-- an inline commend
-- and another one
from Y

query.description: Sequences for whitespace and comments are skipped
query.adql:
SELECT point('icrs', 3, 4) || 'aaaa'
-- an inline commend
-- and another one
from Y

query.description: Sequences for whitespace and comments are skipped
query.adql:
SELECT 'text'*1323
-- an inline comment
-- and another one
from Y
